caption: MITRE Sub-technique
description: The MITRE Sub-technique object describes the ATT&CK® or ATLAS™ Sub-technique ID and/or name associated to an attack.
name: sub_technique

name.description: The name of the attack sub-technique. For example: Scanning IP Blocks or User Execution: Unsafe ML Artifacts.

src_url.description: The versioned permalink of the attack sub-technique. For example: https://attack.mitre.org/versions/v14/techniques/T1595/001/.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the attack sub-technique. For example: T1595.001 or AML.T0011.000.
